SQL.LOAD: SELECT equipment_recon_wrk_id, file_processed_id, load_status, record_type, manufacturer, model, description, is_master, master_equipment_description, repairable, equipment_class, equipment_type, manufacturer_warranty, attributes, note1, note2, note3, note4, note5, note6, note7, note8, note9, note10, reject_reason, reject_code, reject_msg_parms, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date FROM elp_equipment_recon_wrk WHERE equipment_recon_wrk_id = :equipment_recon_wrk_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST:
SELECT ERW.equipment_recon_wrk_id, ERW.file_processed_id, ERW.load_status, ERW.record_type, ERW.manufacturer, ERW.model, ERW.description, ERW.is_master, ERW.master_equipment_description, ERW.repairable, ERW.equipment_class, ERW.equipment_type, ERW.manufacturer_warranty, ERW.attributes, ERW.note1, ERW.note2, ERW.note3, ERW.note4, ERW.note5, ERW.note6, ERW.note7, ERW.note8, ERW.note9, ERW.note10, ERW.reject_reason, ERW.reject_code, ERW.reject_msg_parms, ERW.created_by, ERW.created_date, ERW.modified_by, ERW.modified_date, mc.MSG_PARAMETER_COUNT, (SELECT TRANSLATION FROM ELP_LABEL innerL Inner join elp_dict_item_translation innert on innert.DICT_ITEM_ID =
innerl.DICT_ITEM_ID and innert.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id WHERE innerL.ui_prog_code = l.ui_prog_code ) Translated_MSG FROM elp_equipment_recon_wrk ERW left outer join (select MSG_CODE, LABEL_ID, MSG_PARAMETER_COUNT From elp_message_code inner join ELP_LIST_ITEM li ON msg_type = li.LIST_ITEM_ID AND li.code =
'DLREJECT' INNER JOIN ELP_LIST l ON l.LIST_ID = li.LIST_ID AND l.code = 'MSGTYPE' ) mc on mc.MSG_CODE = ERW.reject_code left outer join elp_label l on l.label_id = mc.label_id WHERE file_processed_id = :file_processed_id AND reject_reason IS NOT NULL
SQL.LOAD_REJECT_LIST: SELECT customer_name, record_type, reject_reason FROM elp_equipment_recon_wrk WHERE file_processed_id = :file_processed_id AND reject_reason IS NOT NULL
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_equipment_recon_wrk SET equipment_recon_wrk_id=:equipment_recon_wrk_id, file_processed_id=:file_processed_id, load_status=:load_status, record_type=:record_type, manufacturer=:manufacturer, model=:model, description=:description, is_master=:is_master, master_equipment_description=:master_equipment_description, equipment_class=:equipment_class, equipment_type=:equipment_type, manufacturer_warranty=:manufacturer_warranty, repairable=:repairable, attributes=:attributes, note1=:note1, note2=:note2, note3=:note3, note4=:note4, note5=:note5, note6=:note6, note7=:note7, note8=:note8, note9=:note9, note10=:note10, reject_reason=:reject_reason, reject_code=:reject_code, reject_msg_parms=:reject_msg_parms, created_by=:created_by, created_date=:created_date, modified_by=:modified_by, modified_date=:modified_date WHERE equipment_recon_wrk_id = :equipment_recon_wrk_id AND NVL(modified_date,created_date) = NVL (:modified_date,created_date)
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_equipment_recon_wrk ( equipment_recon_wrk_id, file_processed_id, load_status, record_type, manufacturer, model, description, is_master, master_equipment_description, equipment_class, equipment_type, manufacturer_warranty, repairable, attributes, note1, note2, note3, note4, note5, note6, note7, note8, note9, note10, reject_reason, reject_mode, reject_msg_parms, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, ) VALUES ( :equipment_recon_wrk_id, :file_processed_id, :load_status, :record_type, :manufacturer, :model, :description, :is_master, :master_equipment_description, :equipment_class, :equipment_type, :manufacturer_warranty, :repairable, :attributes, :note1, :note2, :note3, :note4, :note5, :note6, :note7, :note8, :note9, :note10, :reject_reason, :reject_mode, :reject_msg_parms, :created_by, :created_date, :modified_by, :modified_date, )
